pages.text: $(item)Milk and Cheese$() are the main sources of $(l:food/nutrition)Dairy$() in TFC. Milk is obtained by $(4)right-clicking$() on a $(l:food/animal_husbandry)familiarized$() cow with a wooden bucket. Cheese requires a certain set of $(l:processes/barrels)processing$() steps to make.

$(thing)Making Cheese$()$(br2)1. Mix 250mB of Alcohol and a Fruit to get 250mB of Vinegar$(br)2. Mix 9,000mB of Milk and 1,000mB of Vinegar in a barrel. This instantly creates Vinegar Milk.$(br)3. Seal the Vinegar Milk for 8 hours to turn it into Curdled Milk$(br)4. Seal the curdled milk for 8 hour to make cheese.$(br2)$(thing)Note: 625mB of curdled milk makes 2 cheese$()
